üçÄSpringleaf Park Connector connect Upper Thomson Road to Lentor Avenue.
üçÄThe entire Park Connector runs side by side to Sungei Seletar.
üö¶N√©e Soon Road cuts through the Springleaf Park Connector, so you need to cross the road to continue on.
üçÄAs you stroll through this lush Park Connector, you can hear the constant bird calls, testimony to its rich biodiversity.
üêæIt's a jogging track for the nearby residents.
Nice short PCN connecting Lentor Avenue to Upper Thomson Road. Good for a short morning walk before breakfast. Within 5 minutes walk from Springleaf MRT Station.

Since the opening of the Springleaf PCN between 2014 to 2015 , it has been one of my cycling and walking routes to cross over Lentor Avenue to Upper Thomson Road & vice versa. For bird watchers, it's one of the spots in SG. One thing for sure, I will never failed to see the water lilies in the Seletar River.
If want a peaceful and quiet place to excercise , this is the place to go . You will be immersed in the nature and fresh air that this place can offer.
Feel Calm and peace here~ nice for morning walk
